${ModID}:Swipe.NAME: Swipe
${ModID}:Swipe.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has Strength, steal !M! Strength and Exhaust. Otherwise, draw 2 cards.

${ModID}:Rope.NAME: Rope
${ModID}:Rope.DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Startup: Costs 0 until played.

${ModID}:SecondStrike.NAME: Second Strike
${ModID}:SecondStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Whenever you play an Attack, if this is in your hand, reduce its cost by 1 this turn.

${ModID}:Dargosbane.NAME: Dargosbane
${ModID}:Dargosbane.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Give a random card in your hand Retain.
${ModID}:Dargosbane.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Give a card in your hand Retain.

${ModID}:Tech.NAME: Tech
${ModID}:Tech.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play a card with a reduced cost, return this from your discard pile to your Hand.

${ModID}:StayWinning.NAME: Stay Winning
${ModID}:StayWinning.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each Attack played this turn. NL Becomes Unplayable for the rest of the turn.

${ModID}:TragicBackstory.NAME: Tragic Backstory
${ModID}:TragicBackstory.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if 2 or more cards were Exhausted this combat. NL Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: My Exhaust pile is too small!

${ModID}:CleanHouse.NAME: Clean House
${ModID}:CleanHouse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next time you ${ModID}:Waste, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:Toothpicks.NAME: Toothpicks
${ModID}:Toothpicks.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage twice.

${ModID}:Spit.NAME: Spit
${ModID}:Spit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard 1 card. NL Draw 1 card.

${ModID}:Cheapen.NAME: Cheapen
${ModID}:Cheapen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have no Energy, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand to 0 until played.

${ModID}:Flashlight.NAME: Flashlight
${ModID}:Flashlight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scry !M!. NL Exhaust discarded Status and Curse cards.

${ModID}:Hone.NAME: Hone
${ModID}:Hone.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust up to 2 cards from your draw pile.

${ModID}:SilverBullet.NAME: Silver Bullet
${ModID}:SilverBullet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL When you draw this, if your draw pile is empty, it costs 0 until played.
${ModID}:SilverBullet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL When you draw this, if your draw pile is empty, it costs 0 until played.

${ModID}:MurderyMysteryMayhem.NAME: Murder Mystery Mayhem
${ModID}:MurderyMysteryMayhem.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Gain Strength equal to your ${ModID}:Horror. NL ${ModID}:Horrifying 1.

${ModID}:MechanoFist.NAME: Mechano-Fist
${ModID}:MechanoFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Gain Block equal to the highest number on that card.

${ModID}:Chainsaw.NAME: Chainsaw
${ModID}:Chainsaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can only target Vulnerable foes.

${ModID}:Explosion.NAME: Explosion
${ModID}:Explosion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ClutchingHands.NAME: Clutching Hands
${ModID}:ClutchingHands.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a cost 0 card from your hand twice.

${ModID}:ItsComing.NAME: It's Coming
${ModID}:ItsComing.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less each turn. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this card's cost by 3 this combat.

${ModID}:LetsDance.NAME: Let's Dance
${ModID}:LetsDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw until you draw a non-Attack card.

${ModID}:BargainBin.NAME: Bargain Bin
${ModID}:BargainBin.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card for a reduced cost, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:HumDownTheCorridor.NAME: Hum Down the Corridor
${ModID}:HumDownTheCorridor.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, Attacks deal !M! more damage that turn.

${ModID}:Daemon.NAME: Daemon
${ModID}:Daemon.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain [E]. NL Whenever you Waste, gain !M! Block and deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:EvilLaughter.NAME: Evil Laughter
${ModID}:EvilLaughter.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for each card in your hand.
${ModID}:EvilLaughter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for each card in your hand.

${ModID}:WelcomeToHell.NAME: Welcome To Hell
${ModID}:WelcomeToHell.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Whenever you attack that enemy this turn, apply 1 Vulnerable.

${ModID}:FoolsGuard.NAME: Fool's Guard
${ModID}:FoolsGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, discard 1 random card and gain [E].

${ModID}:SelfImproverShield.NAME: Self-Improver Shield
${ModID}:SelfImproverShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1 for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:EchoesOfFear.NAME: Echoes of Fear
${ModID}:EchoesOfFear.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile. NL Gain [E]. NL ${ModID}:Horrifying 1.
${ModID}:EchoesOfFear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL ${ModID}:Horrifying 1.

${ModID}:GKsNightmare.NAME: GK's Nightmare!
${ModID}:GKsNightmare.DESCRIPTION: Add X Iron Waves into your hand. NL They cost 0 this combat. NL ${ModID}:Horrifying 1.
${ModID}:GKsNightmare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X Iron Wave+s into your hand. NL They cost 0 this combat. NL ${ModID}:Horrifying 1.

${ModID}:BackupBuddy.NAME: Backup Buddy!
${ModID}:BackupBuddy.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Next time you ${ModID}:Waste, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:PortalPunch.NAME: Portal Punch
${ModID}:PortalPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Costs 1 less for each card with a reduced cost played this combat.

${ModID}:Boil.NAME: Boil
${ModID}:Boil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Attack played this turn.

${ModID}:NoWay.NAME: No Way
${ModID}:NoWay.DESCRIPTION: The first !M! times you play a card for a reduced cost each turn, draw 1 card.

${ModID}:VoraciousReader.NAME: Voracious Reader
${ModID}:VoraciousReader.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Waste, play a random card from your discard pile.

${ModID}:VeryNaturalSynergy.NAME: Very Natural Synergy
${ModID}:VeryNaturalSynergy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL If the last card you played was [CARD_FOR_RUN], gain !B! Block and !M! Strength.

${ModID}:NotHereNotNow.NAME: Not Here, Not Now
${ModID}:NotHereNotNow.DESCRIPTION: All enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Afterwards, they gain 1 Strength.

${ModID}:DieOff.NAME: Die Off
${ModID}:DieOff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Strike into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BitBlast.NAME: Bit Blast
${ModID}:BitBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're a ${ModID}:Gamer, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:Jumpscare.NAME: Jumpscare
${ModID}:Jumpscare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Delay 4: Deal !${ModID}:d2! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:EnterTheSlimepit.NAME: Enter The Slimepits
${ModID}:EnterTheSlimepit.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Add 2 *Slimed into your hand.
${ModID}:EnterTheSlimepit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Add 2 *Slimed into your hand.

${ModID}:StickySituation.NAME: Sticky Situation
${ModID}:StickySituation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a *Slimed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Wailing.NAME: Wailing !!!
${ModID}:Wailing.DESCRIPTION: The first time you Exhaust a card each turn, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
${ModID}:Wailing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first !M! times you Exhaust a card each turn, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Nextpunger.NAME: Nextpunger
${ModID}:Nextpunger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Hits an additional time for each time you ${ModID}:Wasted this combat.

${ModID}:Netdeck.NAME: Netdeck
${ModID}:Netdeck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a random Power into your hand. NL If you're a ${ModID}:Gamer, it costs 0.

${ModID}:Naptime.NAME: Naptime
${ModID}:Naptime.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat. NL Reduce your ${ModID}:Delays by !M!.

${ModID}:EpicGamerBlaster.NAME: Epic Gamer Blaster
${ModID}:EpicGamerBlaster.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 2x damage for each card type played this turn.

${ModID}:ExtremeGayPower.NAME: Extreme Gay Power
${ModID}:ExtremeGayPower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E]. NL Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, add a *Pride into your hand.

${ModID}:MadBomber.NAME: Mad Bomber
${ModID}:MadBomber.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a ${ModID}:Delay triggers, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Improvise.NAME: Improvise
${ModID}:Improvise.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Attacks into your hand, one from another color. NL When you play one, Exhaust the others.

${ModID}:Ritual.NAME: Ritual
${ModID}:Ritual.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each card Exhausted this combat. NL Gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:ComputeFetch.NAME: Compute Fetch
${ModID}:ComputeFetch.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Delay 3: Put a card from your draw pile into your hand.

${ModID}:GlogusWrath.NAME: Glogus' Wrath
${ModID}:GlogusWrath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Add 2 Slimed into your hand.

${ModID}:Termina.NAME: Termina
${ModID}:Termina.DESCRIPTION: Delay 9: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:TheGreatAndTerribleEverycard.NAME: The Great and Terrible Everycard
${ModID}:TheGreatAndTerribleEverycard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust your hand. NL ${ModID}:Delay 4: Add a random Attack into your hand. It costs 0. NL Gain [E].

${ModID}:MurphysLaw.NAME: Murphy's Law
${ModID}:MurphysLaw.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, add a random Attack into your hand.
${ModID}:MurphysLaw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play an Attack, add a random Attack into your hand.

${ModID}:OnThatGrind.NAME: On That Grind
${ModID}:OnThatGrind.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you become a ${ModID}:Gamer, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:GamerGod.NAME: Gamer God
${ModID}:GamerGod.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you're a ${ModID}:Gamer, draw 2 cards next turn.
${ModID}:GamerGod.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, if you're a ${ModID}:Gamer, draw 2 cards next turn.

${ModID}:TimeTraveler.NAME: Time Traveler
${ModID}:TimeTraveler.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you get a ${ModID}:Delay, add a copy of it with 4 more Delay.

${ModID}:CatastropheForm.NAME: Catastrophe Form
${ModID}:CatastropheForm.DESCRIPTION: The first !M! times you draw a cost 1 card each turn, play it and draw a card.

${ModID}:Memory.NAME: Memory
${ModID}:Memory.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Return a non-Gravesite card from your discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Memory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Return a non-Gravesite card from your discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TheAbsentMoon.NAME: The Absent Moon
${ModID}:TheAbsentMoon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL You can play this from your draw pile.

${ModID}:Vengeance.NAME: Vengeance
${ModID}:Vengeance.DESCRIPTION: Play all Attacks in your Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:HaHaHaHaHa.NAME: HaHahaHaHa
${ModID}:HaHaHaHaHa.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card, gain [E] and gain !M! ${ModID}:Meanie_Points for each card type played this turn.

${ModID}:TempCyborg.NAME: Temporary Cyborg
${ModID}:TempCyborg.DESCRIPTION: Delay !M!: Play an Attack in your hand 3 times, then Exhaust it.
